channel.title: I need to change the Ip's in the client and the source
channel.description: I need to change Ip's in client and source because my friend is running server right now and I need to take over where would I find his Ip's so i can change them.

item.title: I need to change the Ip's in the client and the source
item.dc:creator: @Edison499007 Edison499007
item.description:
@Edison499007 wrote:

Where do I change the client to connect to my IP?

Read full topic
item.source: I need to change the Ip's in the client and the source

item.title: I need to change the Ip's in the client and the source
item.dc:creator: @frozon566 frozon566
item.description:
@frozon566 wrote:

Have him send you the server and client, then change the client to connect to your IP, since servers listen on the hosts IP address.

Read full topic
item.source: I need to change the Ip's in the client and the source
